title: MARKET SNAPSHOT: S&P 500 And Nasdaq Rise In Stock -2-
text:
The ICE U.S. Dollar Index , which tracks the performance of the greenback against six major rivals, gained 0.2% at 97.496.

Elsewhere, the Stoxx Europe 600 rose 0.5% at 97.729.

In Asia, China's CSI 300 index fell less than 0.1% to 3,870.67 and the Shanghai Composite Index was virtually flat to close at 2,940.92, while Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index jumped 0.9% to reach 26,797.95, more than erasing its decline from the previous session. Japan's Nikkei 225 rose 0.5% to 22,750.60.

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 24, 2019 11:33 ET (15:33 GMT)
